DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate intranasal oxytocin improve hyperphagia , social skill , behavior subject Prader-Willi syndrome . This randomized placebo control pilot study . The primary outcome measure determine intranasal administration oxytocin cause adverse event subject Prader-Willi syndrome . Secondarily , investigator also perform evaluation determine intranasal oxytocin effect social skill , behavior , appetite child Prader-Willi syndrome .
